floating_window_sc_shortcut_exp:
You can register up to 3 commands to a shortcut from this 
menu. Select an icon and touch the menu icon without opening 
it to save it to the shortcut.
floating_window_sc_shortcut_entry?: Which shortcut slot would you like to assign this to?
floating_window_sc_shortcut_full:
Your shortcuts are all in use.
Which would you like to swap out?
floating_window_sc_shortcut_replace:
Swap out %ls for 
the %ls shortcut.
Is that OK?
floating_window_sc_shortcut_entry:
The %ls command
was saved to a shortcut.
floating_window_sc_shortcut_registered:
The "%ls" Command is now assigned
to shortcut slot #%ls.
